title: Had to make sujood as sahu before salam, forgot & made it after salam, is prayer valid Assimalhakeem
transcript: [Music] from india says he made a mistake he was totally confused whether he performed one sajda or two so he added another sajdah which is totally legit and instead of performing the two prostrations of forgetfulness before salaam he forgot and offered the salam and then he offered the two prostrations after the salaam is his prayer valid prayer is valid without any problem alhamdulillah you
